description: Values of the active job

contents.name: BoxId
contents.description: Id of the box in which the current production is put in

contents.name: CurrentLotName
contents.description: Name of the current production lot

contents.name: JobStatus
contents.description: Current status of the job

contents.name: FinishJob
contents.description: With this Method the client (e.g. MES) requests the machine to change the JobStatus to JOB_FINISHED_8

contents.name: InterruptJob
contents.description: With this Method the client (e.g. MES) requests the machine to change the JobStatus to JOB_INTERRUPTED_7

contents.name: StartJob
contents.description: With this Method the client (e.g. MES) requests the machine to change the JobStatus to JOB_IN_PRODUCTION_6

description: Values of the active job for cyclic production

contents.name: AverageCycleTime

contents.name: BoxCycleCounter
contents.description: Number of finished cycles for the current box

contents.name: BoxGoodPartsCounter
contents.description: Number of good parts produced in the current box

contents.name: BoxPartsCounter
contents.description: Total number of parts produced in the current box

contents.name: BoxTestSamplesCounter
contents.description: Number of test sample parts produced in the current box

contents.description: Number of good parts produced in the current job

contents.name: ResetBoxCounters

contents.name: StopAtCycleEnd
contents.description: Directs the machine to stop at the end of the current cycle

description: OffNormalAlarmType with additional help text

description: Logbook events are fired by the machine for the documentation of relevant changes in the machine configuration/status

contents.name: EventOriginator
contents.description: Originator of a logbook event

contents.name: JobCycleCounter
contents.description: Current value of JobCycleCounter in the ActiveJobValues Object when the event is fired. Only to be used for cyclic production

contents.name: User
contents.description: Indicates the user who is responsible for the change that leads to the event. The fields of UserType shall be null if no user is directly responsible (e.g. for messages coming from the machine control system).

description: The MachineModeChangeLogType is used for logging changes of the machine mode

schemas.description: Current machine mode (as defined by mode selector on the machine)

contents.name: NewMachineMode
contents.description: New machine mode

contents.name: OldMachineMode
contents.description: Old machine mode

description: The MessageLogType is used for logging MessageConditions

contents.name: Classification
contents.description: Classification of the message

contents.name: Id
contents.description: Id of the message

contents.name: IsStandstillMessage
contents.description: Indication if the message has led to a standstill

description: The ParameterChangeLogType is used for the logging of relevant changes in production parameters. The decision which parameter is relevant for the production is done by the machine.

contents.name: NewValue
contents.description: New value of the changed parameter

contents.name: NewValueUnit
contents.description: New unit of the changed parameter

contents.name: OldValue
contents.description: Old value of the changed parameter

contents.name: OldValueUnit
contents.description: Old unit of the changed parameter

contents.name: ParameterId
contents.description: Id of the changed parameter

description: The ProductionDatasetChangeLogType is used when a new production dataset is loaded and activated in the control system of the machine

contents.name: NewProductionDatasetName
contents.description: Name of new production dataset

contents.name: OldProductionDatasetName
contents.description: Name of old production dataset

description: The ProductionDatasetFrozenLogType is used when a production dataset is locked or unlocked

contents.name: NewValue
contents.description: Information if the production dataset is now locked

contents.name: OldValue
contents.description: Information if the production dataset was locked

description: The ProductionStatusChangeLogType is used for logging changes of the production status

contents.name: OldProductionStatus

description: The RemoteAccessLogType is used for logging access from outside to the machine (e.g. remote service)

schemas.description: Information if a user logs in or off

contents.name: Origin
contents.description: Information about the origin of the remote access

contents.name: RemoteUserName
contents.description: Name of the remote user (e.g. name of the service employee doing remote service)

contents.name: UserChange
contents.description: Information if the user logs in or off

description: The SequenceChangeLogType is used for the logging changes in the production sequence

contents.name: SequenceChange
contents.description: Classification of production sequence change

description: The StandstillReasonLogType is used for logging StandstillReasons

contents.description: Id of the standstill reason

description: The UserFeedbackLogType is used for logging text messages entered by the user into the machine control system

contents.name: Classification
contents.description: Classification of the message

description: The UserLogType is used for logging which users are logged in to the machine

schemas.description: Information if a user logs in or off

contents.name: UserChange
contents.description: Information if the user logs in or off

description: This EventType is used to initiate a call of SendCyclicJobList by the client

This EventType is used to initiate a call of SendJobList by the client
This EventType is used initiate a call of SendProductionDatasetList by the client

contents.name: MouldId

contents.name: NameFilter
contents.description: Filtering the list of production datasets by name

description: This EventType is used to trigger a production dataset transfer from the server to the client by the server (e.g. initiated by the operator)

contents.name: Name
contents.description: Name of the production dataset that should be transferred from the server to the client

contents.name: Storage
contents.description: Indication from where the dataset is read

description: This EventType is used to trigger a production dataset transfer from the client to the server by the server (e.g. initiated by the operator)

schemas.description: Indication which parts of the production dataset shall be activated in the machine control after writing

contents.name: Components
contents.description: Array which indicates which parts of the production dataset shall be activated in the machine control after writing

contents.name: Name
contents.description: Name of the production dataset that should be transferred from the client to the server

contents.name: Storage
contents.description: Indication where the dataset is written to

description: Settings for the closed loop control on the device for a parameter

schemas.description: Structure for storing the parameters of a PID controller

contents.name: AutomaticControllerMode
contents.description: Determination if PID Parameters are determined by auto-tuning itself (TRUE) or can be manually adjusted (FALSE)

contents.name: AutoTuningActive
contents.description: Informs if the automatic tuning is currently active

contents.name: PIDParameters
contents.description: PID Parameters as array if several input signals (sensors) are used for the control

contents.name: AutoTuningOff
contents.description: Stops an already active self-optimisation process (no control parameters are changed)

contents.name: AutoTuningOn
contents.description: Starts the self-optimisation of the controller

description: Information about a production job

contents.name: ContinueAtJobEnd
contents.description: Indication if the machine continues the production even if the nominal output has been reached

contents.name: CustomerName
contents.description: Name of the customer for that the job is produced

contents.name: JobDescription
contents.description: Description of the job

contents.name: JobName
contents.description: Name of the job

contents.name: Material
contents.description: Array of material names used for the job

contents.name: ProductDescription
contents.description: Array of descriptions of the products produced by the job

contents.name: ProductionDatasetDescription
contents.description: Additional description of the production dataset which is needed for the job

contents.name: ProductionDatasetName
contents.description: Name of the production dataset which is needed for the job

contents.name: ProductName
contents.description: Array of product names produced by the job

description: Information about a cyclic production job

contents.name: ExpectedCycleTime
contents.description: Calculated cycle time for the job

contents.name: MouldId
contents.description: Id of the Mould used for the job

contents.name: NominalBoxParts
contents.description: Number of parts that shall be put into one box

contents.name: NominalParts
contents.description: Total number (sum of all cavities) of parts that shall be produced by the job

contents.name: NumCavities
contents.description: Number of cavities in the Mould used for production

contents.name: SetCyclicJobData
contents.description: Method for setting the data for cyclic jobs

description: Management of production jobs on the machine and information on their status including process parameters

schemas.description: Description of a job in a cyclic job list
Description of a job in a job list

contents.name: SendCyclicJobList
contents.description: Sends a list of jobs for cyclic processes available on the client to the server

contents.name: SendJobList
contents.description: Sends a list of jobs available on the client to the server

contents.name: ActiveJob
contents.description: Job that is currently active on the machine

contents.name: ActiveJobValues
contents.description: Status of the job

contents.name: JobInPreparation
contents.description: Job in a preparation layer of the machine

description: Current configuration of the machine

schemas.description: Information on a page that is implemented in the machine control system and shown on the screen of the machine

contents.name: LocationName
contents.description: Description of the location of the machine given by the machine operator or OPC client

contents.name: PageDirectory
contents.description: List of the pages that are implemented in the machine control system and are shown on the screen of the machine

contents.name: TimeZoneOffset
contents.description: Difference of the local time to Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) given by the machine operator or OPC client

contents.name: UserMachineName
contents.description: Description of the machine given by the machine operator or OPC client

contents.name: GetCurrentPage
contents.description: Method for retrieving a screenshot of the control system with the currently shown contents

contents.name: GetPage
contents.description: Method for retrieving the image of a page of the control system

contents.name: SetMachineTime
contents.description: Method for setting the server time together with TimeZoneOffset

description: Current configuration of a machine related to a Manufacturing Execution System (MES)

contents.name: MESUrl
contents.description: URL to display a webpage generated by the MES in a web browser integrated in the machine

contents.name: StandstillReasons
contents.description: List of the standstill reasons from which one is selected by the operator in the case of a standstill

contents.name: StandstillReasonsLockedByMES
contents.description: Indication if the list StandstillReasons has been modified by the MES and may not be changed by the machine

description: Current status of a machine related to the MES

contents.name: StandstillReasonId
contents.description: Id of the StandstillReason set by the operator after a standstill occurs

contents.name: ClearMESMessage
contents.description: Method for clearing the MESMessage

contents.name: SetMESMessage
contents.description: Method for setting the MESMessage

contents.name: MESMessage
contents.description: Text message sent from the MES to be shown on the machine

contents.name: ProductionControl
contents.description: Control of the production of the machine by MES

description: Information on the current status of the machine

schemas.description: Current machine mode (as defined by mode selector on the machine)

contents.name: IsPresent
contents.description: Indication if the machine is physically present and connected

contents.name: MachineMode
contents.description: Current machine mode (as defined by mode selector on the machine)

contents.name: ActivateSleepMode
contents.description: Method for activation of sleep mode

contents.name: DeactivateSleepMode
contents.description: Method for deactivation of sleep mode

contents.name: Users
contents.description: Container for the user(s) of the machine

description: Provides information on the maintenance status of a machine, device or component

contents.name: AdditionalInformation
contents.description: Additional information on the necessary maintenance. Can be also a link to another document.

contents.name: Status
contents.description: Maintenance status of the machine/device/component (represented by the parent element)

contents.name: Interval
contents.description: Regular interval between two maintenances

contents.name: RemainingInterval
contents.description: Interval before next maintenance is due

contents.name: TotalOperation
contents.description: How long is the component running in total

contents.name: Reset
contents.description: This Method sets the RemainingInterval to Interval and Status to NOT_DUE_0

description: Text message sent from the MES to be shown on the machine

contents.name: Id
contents.description: Id of the message

contents.name: Message
contents.description: Text of the message

contents.name: Severity
contents.description: Severity of the message

description: Used for process parameters that are monitored by the client

contents.name: AutomaticMonitoring
contents.description: Determination if monitoring tolerance parameters are determined by auto-tuning itself (TRUE) or can be manually adjusted (FALSE)

contents.name: ActualValue
contents.description: Actual value of the monitored parameter

contents.name: AlarmSuppression
contents.description: The start-up alarm suppression deactivates alarms of a monitored parameter during start up or a setpoint jump

contents.name: LowerTolerance
contents.description: Lower relative tolerance value of the process parameter

contents.name: LowerTolerance2
contents.description: Second lower relative tolerance value of the process parameter

contents.name: MaxValue
contents.description: Maximum absolute value of the process parameter

contents.name: MinValue
contents.description: Minimum absolute value of the process parameter

contents.name: MonitoringSensitivity
contents.description: Defines how closely the tolerances are set during the automatic limit setting

contents.name: SetRampDown
contents.description: Indication if SetValue that is lower than the actual value shall be reached as fast as possible (SetRampDown = 0) or within a given value change per time

contents.name: SetRampUp
contents.description: Indication if a SetValue that is higher than the actual value shall be reached as fast as possible (SetRampUp = 0) or within a given value change per time

contents.name: SetValue
contents.description: Set/nominal/target value of the monitored parameter

contents.name: Status
contents.description: Information if the ActualValue is within the tolerances or has passed a tolerance or min/max value

contents.name: UpperTolerance
contents.description: Upper relative tolerance value of the process parameter

contents.name: UpperTolerance2
contents.description: Second upper relative tolerance value of the process parameter

contents.name: ResetMonitoring
contents.description: With this method the tolerance values are set according to the actual value and the set monitoring sensitivity

description: Used for process parameters that are controlled by the client by writing a set value and optional ramps and parameters for closed loop control

contents.name: ClosedLoopControl
contents.description: With this type the client can do settings for the closed loop control on the device for a parameter

schemas.description: Indication how the parameter is currently controlled

description: Information on the production cycle related to a mould

contents.name: Index
contents.description: Number of the mould

contents.name: MouldStatus
contents.description: Current (physical) status of the mould

contents.name: TemperatureZones
contents.description: Container for the temperature zones of the mould

description: Control of the production of the machine by MES

contents.name: ProductionStatus
contents.description: Production status when the machine is in automatic or semi-automatic mode

contents.description: Method for disabling the semi-automatic and automatic run of the machine

contents.name: EnableAutomaticRun
contents.description: Method for enabling the semi-automatic and automatic run of the machine

contents.name: RequestTestSample
contents.description: The machine shall separate a test sample (e.g. for quality check). The size of the test sample depends on the product/machine configuration.

contents.name: ResetWatchDog
contents.description: Setting the watch dog timer to the value set by the last calling of SetWatchDogTime

contents.name: SetWatchDogTime

description: Functions for exchanging information on the available production datasets on client and server

contents.name: GetProductionDatasetList
contents.description: This Method is used to read a list from the server, which production datasets that are available on the machine's file system

contents.name: SendProductionDatasetList
contents.description: This Method is used to send a list of production datasets available on the client to the server

description: Management of production datasets

contents.name: GetProductionDatasetInformation
contents.description: This Method allows reading the description of a production dataset during the file transfer from the server to the client with ProductionDatasetTransfer

contents.name: SendProductionDatasetInformation
contents.description: This Method allows sending of the description of a production dataset during the file transfer from the client to the server with ProductionDatasetTransfer

contents.name: ActiveProductionDatasetStatus
contents.description: Status of the active production dataset

contents.name: ProductionDatasetInPreparationStatus
contents.description: Status of the production dataset in the preparation layer

contents.name: ProductionDatasetLists
contents.description: Functions for exchanging information on the available production datasets on client and server

contents.name: ProductionDatasetTransfer
contents.description: Transfer of production datasets between server and client

description: Status of a production dataset

contents.name: Frozen
contents.description: Indication if changes on the machine in the production dataset are allowed

contents.name: Information
contents.description: Set of information on the production dataset

contents.name: Modified
contents.description: Indication if the production dataset has been changed after the last storage

contents.name: Load
contents.description: Loads a production dataset from the file system of the machine to the control of the machine

contents.name: Save
contents.description: Stores a production dataset from the control of the machine to the file system of the machine

description: Information on the fault which causes standstill. This is set by machine control

contents.description: Classification of the message

contents.name: Id
contents.description: Id of the message

contents.name: Message
contents.description: Text of the message

contents.name: Severity
contents.description: Severity of the message

description: Information on the production cycle related to a temperature zone

contents.name: Classification
contents.description: Type of the temperature zone

contents.name: Index
contents.description: Number of the zone

contents.name: Name
contents.description: Name of the zone

contents.name: ActualTemperature
contents.description: Current temperature of the zone

description: Container for objects of TemperatureZoneType
Information about a temperature zone e.g. on moulds and barrels

schemas.description: Indication how the parameter is currently controlled

contents.name: Classification
contents.description: Type of the temperature zone

contents.name: ControlMode
contents.description: Indication how the temperature is currently controlled

contents.name: Index
contents.description: Number of the zone

contents.name: IsPresent
contents.description: Indication if the temperature zone is physically present and connected

contents.name: Name
contents.description: Name of the zone

contents.name: ActualTemperature
contents.description: Current temperature of the zone

contents.name: HighDeviationTemperature1
contents.description: Maximum temperature that is in the normal tolerance. A higher actual value may create a warning. Used for quality control. Relative value.

contents.name: HighDeviationTemperature2
contents.description: Maximum tolerable temperature. A higher actual value may create an alarm. Relative value.

contents.name: LowDeviationTemperature1
contents.description: Minimum temperature that is in the normal tolerance. A lower actual value may create a warning. Used for quality control. Relative value.

contents.name: LowDeviationTemperature2
contents.description: Minimum tolerable temperature. A lower actual value may create an alarm. Relative value.

contents.name: NominalTemperature
contents.description: Nominal temperature (absolute value)

contents.name: StandbyTemperature
contents.description: Standby temperature of the zone

description: Information about a temperature zone on a barrel

contents.name: Position
contents.description: Location of the temperature zone on a barrel. Counting starts with 1 beginning from the feeding. The highest position is at the nozzle.

description: Information about a temperature zone in a mould
General information about a machine (less detailed than MachineInformationType)

contents.name: YearOfConstruction
contents.description: Represents the year of construction of the machine

description: General description of the machine

schemas.description: Information which LogbookEvents are supported by the machine

contents.name: ControllerName
contents.description: Name of the machine controller

contents.name: SupportedLogbookEvents
contents.description: Information which LogbookEvents are supported by the machine

description: Container for objects of UserType

contents.name: CardUid
contents.description: Uid of the identification card used by the operator for logging in to the machine

contents.name: Id
contents.description: Id of the user

contents.name: IsPresent
contents.description: The machine can have instances for the maximum number of users that can be simultaneously logged in. TRUE if the instance of UserType represents a user that is currently logged in.

contents.name: Language
contents.description: Currently selected language on the machine control unit

contents.name: Name
contents.description: Name of the user

contents.name: UserLevel
contents.description: Level of the user

contents.name: UserRole
contents.description: Role of the user
